attributes.action: Make Roy Hodgson unable to pick Wayne Rooney for England's Euro 2016 squad
attributes.additional_details: Players who are more deserving of a spot and would offer more to England at the tournament. Vardy, Kane, Sterling, Walcott, Deeney, Barkely, Ali, Sturridge, Oxlade-Chamberlain, Berahino, Cameron Jerome, Albrighton, Puncheon, Zaha
attributes.background: Wayne Rooney has been truly awful this year and is undeserving of a spot in England's squad for Euro 2016 in France. Being named captain has forced Hodgson in a comer to pick him, when there are a number of players in much better form. Wayne Rooney must therefore be made ineligible for selection!!
